properties.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 2:38PM AKST until January 1 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow occurring. Plan on difficult
travel conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8
inches are expected.

* WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM Wednesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing and drifting snow will reduce
visibility to one half mile or less at times. Cold wind chills
as low as 40 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10
minutes to exposed skin.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather
conditions are occurring. This will make travel very difficult or
impossible.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST WEDNESDAY
